channel.title: ๑๑How to make sytem update๑๑
channel.description:
How i make " system update in ..... " please help my !!!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:
( only give my link of tutorial or tell my on moparscape )
:rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes:

item.title: ๑๑How to make sytem update๑๑
item.dc:creator: @Xalaq Xalaq
item.description:
@Xalaq wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:8, topic:103971”]Change

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("update")) {

to

if (command.startsWith("update")) {

Because equalsIgnoreCase means the command pertains to ONLY update. startsWith pertains to update AND whatever you put after it. So with the equalsIgnoreCase, it wasn’t recognizing the numbers you were putting in, but startsWith will.[/quote]

You da best, it works, thank you very much!!

Read full topic
item.source: ๑๑How to make sytem update๑๑

item.title: ๑๑How to make sytem update๑๑
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Change

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("update")) {

to

if (command.startsWith("update")) {

Because equalsIgnoreCase means the command pertains to ONLY update. startsWith pertains to update AND whatever you put after it. So with the equalsIgnoreCase, it wasn’t recognizing the numbers you were putting in, but startsWith will.

Read full topic
item.source: ๑๑How to make sytem update๑๑

@Xalaq wrote:

Thats strange cuz when I do ::update 60 it doesnt do anything at all, yet just ::update works

item.title: ๑๑How to make sytem update๑๑
item.dc:creator: @Fireninja4000 Fireninja4000
item.description:
@Fireninja4000 wrote:

[quote=“Xalaq, post:5, topic:103971”]Lol I need to know this too, I’ve tried ::update 60, nothing happens I searched up update in client.java and i’ve only got one result. I dunno if its right or not.

[code]if (playerRights >= 2) {

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("update")) {
	PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
	PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
	PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
	PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }[/code][/quote] Yeah that should be right

Read full topic
item.source: ๑๑How to make sytem update๑๑

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("update")) {
	PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
